channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump says Israel still considering bombing Iran
item.description: President Trump said an Israeli airstrike on Iran is a possibility, but stopped short of saying it will happen soon.

item.title: Forgetting the Denominator
item.description: Where Eicher fails in an otherwise admirable volume is in her decision to praise Churchill too much, and explain Mellon too little.

item.title: The Government Is Not Going to Save Hollywood
item.description: Subsidizing film and television production only props up an obsolete system.

item.title: Trump says he's no king despite protesters contending he is

item.description: Haliburton has scored four clutch game-winning shots in the 2025 NBA Playoffs—one in each round.

item.title: The Wrong Way to Handle the China Threat
item.description: The hazy deal announced by President Trump is, at best, a temporary reprieve snatched out of defeat.

item.title: Same-Day Registration Is Too Easily Gamed By Leftists

item.title: Utah Has Found the Right Middle Ground on Artificial Intelligence
item.description: We don’t have to choose between innovation and safety. With the right structure, we can have both.

item.title: Yes, We Should Have Bombed Japan
item.description: The expenses necessary to end the war had to be paid by the instigators.

item.title: Wealthy couples often face an estate tax: Here’s their favorite legal maneuver to get around it

item.title: California Was Never The ‘Homeland’ Of Mexican Invaders
item.description: The notion that California and the Southwest are a Mexican 'homeland' is absurd if you look at the history of the region.
